Posts.Title: Finally Made My Decision Re Surgery

Posts.Content: So very happy for you!! Dance the night away!! Congrats!
Posts.Title: Hands off, girls -- NED is all mine today!

Posts.Content: I also had neoadjuvant chemo and a 6cm tumor and have just had a mastectomy on Friday (nodes out during lumpectomy in December). I also am doing radiation next (can't do mine until I can get my arm above my head - not looking good today - but hopefully soon). Reading your post, we sound so much alike! I have a 7 year old daughter. I hope things are going well with your recovery.
Posts.Title: Mastectomy in 5 Days - Having a Hard Time Coming to Terms/Accepting it Emotionally

Posts.Content: Welcome to "our" site! You are among folks who will hold your hand and walk through this nightmare with you. I love the "pink victory" name!
Posts.Title: New to discussions and have questions
